page.title: 10OUR LOCAL NEWSPAPER
page.content: Our local newspaper is called "The Brecon and Radnor Express" and I would like to explain briefly what it looks like,this week,October 31st,1985. The first,second and third pages are all adverts. On pages 4 and 5 there are photographs of weddings and presentations. Page 7 has more photos of Cheese & Wine parties and some Young Farmers Clubs pictures.The 6th and 8th pages both deal with sporting events.Page 9 describes a lot of funerals and sheep-dog trials. On the tenth page the headlines are {"GLOOMY {PROSPECTS FOR EDUCATION"}.Events and entertainments are listed on pages 11 and 12 while pages 14 and 15 are crammed with Auctioneers & Estate Agents' adverts. The last page is all adverts too but it is useful because you can find out what films are on.
